fields.name: AssessmentActivityId
fields.description: The activity ID of the operation that produced this result. It is used to correlate across CRP and extension logs.

fields.name: CriticalAndSecurityPatchCount
fields.description: The number of critical or security patches that have been detected as available and not yet installed.

fields.name: LastModifiedTime
fields.description: The UTC timestamp when the operation began.

fields.name: OtherPatchCount
fields.description: The number of all available patches excluding critical and security.

fields.name: RebootPending
fields.description: The overall reboot status of the VM. It will be true when partially installed patches require a reboot to complete installation but the reboot has not yet occurred.

fields.name: StartTime
fields.description: The UTC timestamp when the operation began.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: The overall success or failure status of the operation. It remains "InProgress" until the operation completes. At that point it will become "Unknown", "Failed", "Succeeded", or "CompletedWithWarnings."
